title: Mitch212
author: Mitch212
content: Hello friends,I want to throw a small giveaway cause Im feeling a bit generous is there a specified section for it? or where I can post it?

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: Mitch212 on September 08, 2022, 10:19:36 AMI want to throw a small giveaway cause Im feeling a bit generous is there a specified section for it? or where I can post it?Very nice from you!First of all, this question may need to be moved to Meta.Second, in order to get an answer, you'll have to tell a bit more, like what you plan to give, since it depends whether it's bitcoin, or altcoin, or goods, for example.

comments.author: Mitch212
comments.body: I would like to giveaway in litecoin

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: Mitch212 on September 08, 2022, 01:44:58 PMI would like to giveaway in litecoinThere are a couple of ways to do it: you can do a bitcoin giveaway in the Games and Rounds section, or you can do an altcoin bounty and post it in the Bounties (Altcoins) section, but you cannot do an altcoin giveaway anywhere on the forum. For that you will have to make an off-site giveaway and post the link on the forum. It is important to note that for altcoin bounty, participants must complete some task (for example: follow/like/share on social networks) but you cannot reward them solely for replying to your thread.
